title: Boat ownership by age in the U.S. 2013
summary: This is a bar chart representing Age (in years) in the x axis and Own a boat in the y axis.
Age (in years) 16 to 34 has the highest Own a boat and 65+ has the lowest Own a boat.
The lowest value at Age (in years) 65+ is 1.37x times less than the highest value at 16 to 34.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Age (in years), and Own a boat in each Age (in years) on the y axis.
The maximum Own a boat 8.2 is found at Age (in years) 16 to 34 and the minimum is found at 65+ where Own a boat is 6.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Age (in years) in the x axis and Own a boat in the y axis.
Age (in years) 16 to 34 has the highest Own a boat and 65+ has the lowest Own a boat.

max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Age (in years), and Own a boat in each Age (in years) on the y axis.
The Own a boat is highest at Age (in years) 16 to 34 and lowest at Age (in years) 65+.
The highest Age (in years) 16 to 34 has 2.2 more Own a boat than the lowest Age (in years) 65+.
The Age (in years) 16 to 34 has the highest Own a boat, followed by , and 45 to 64. Down to the Age (in years) 65+ which is the lowest.
Considered together, the average Own a boat in all 5 Age (in years)s is roughly 7.28.
